text:
Have been a customer with SKN for many years.

I have been undergoing laser treatment with Dr Wong for the past year or so. My skin has improved, pores are smaller and the scars are less deep.
My family members can see the difference as well.

I have oily skin and skin clogs easily. Liz, who is my therapist, is patient and very through with facial extraction. She is friendly, professional and service oriented.

I have been lucky to benefit from their expertise. Their service and results have been excellent and I would happily recommend their service

SKN provides outstanding service for hair and skin, staff are knowledgable and pay attention to details.

Liz is meticulous and always patient, ensure that we are well informed and happy with our treatments. Recommend to engage SKN to take care of your aesthetics :)

The treatment is effective, yielding excellent results. Additionally, Liz, the staff member, provides exceptional service with her friendly demeanor and professional expertise, ensuring a positive and comfortable experience.

Been with SKN for the last 4 years, was satisfied by the professional service provided by their staff.
Effective treatment for scalp and hair, recommeded!
Had been a happy customer of SKN for many years! Special thanks to Liz for her professional services.
